title: Charles Bradley performs soulful cover of Black Sabbath's 'Changes'

lastfm.summary: Charles Bradley's profound interpretation of Changes, released on his third studio album Changes in April 2016, represents a masterful transformation of the original rock ballad into a soul-stirring R&B masterpiece. Working closely with producer Thomas Brenneck and the Daptone Records team, Bradley reimagined the song through the lens of his own life experiences, creating a version that garnered widespread critical acclaim for its raw emotional depth and authentic soul styling. Read more on Last.fm.
